item.title: Need help (pi)
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

look in your data>cnfg>spawn.cnfg

should look something like this// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description //MY NPCS// spawn = 808 3095 3502 0 1 0 0 0 KBD GUIDE spawn = 959 3088 3505 0 1 0 0 0 HEAL/PVP LADY spawn = 303 3088 3488 0 0 0 0 0 GENERAL STORE spawn = 457 3085 3499 0 1 0 0 0 Restless Ghost spawn = 1599 3088 3502 0 1 0 0 0 Slayer Master

change the npc id which is after spawn = (npc id here)
